description: Add Copilot CLI support to Send Review Comments to AI feature

userStories.title: Add Copilot CLI as AI tool option
userStories.description: As a developer, I want to use GitHub Copilot CLI to review my code comments so I can leverage my existing Copilot subscription.
acceptanceCriteria: Add 'copilot' to AI_TOOLS constant in aiTools.ts
Add copilot to aiTool enum in package.json configuration

Add vscode-code-notes.aiToolCopilotModel setting with enum choices: claude-sonnet-4.5, claude-haiku-4.5, claude-opus-4.5, claude-sonnet-4, gpt-5.1-codex-max, gpt-5.1-codex, gpt-5.2, gpt-5.1, gpt-5, gpt-5.1-codex-mini, gpt-5-mini, gpt-4.1, gemini-3-pro-preview (default: gpt-4.1)

userStories.title: Implement Copilot CLI command builder
userStories.description: As a developer, I want the extension to correctly build Copilot CLI commands so my review comments are sent properly.
acceptanceCriteria: Add copilot case to buildCommand function in commandBuilder.ts

userStories.title: Add Copilot to AI tool quick pick
userStories.description: As a developer, I want to see Copilot as an option when selecting AI tools so I can choose it from the UI.
